org.jerkar.plugins.sonar
Class JkSonar

java.lang.Object
  org.jerkar.plugins.sonar.JkSonar

public final class JkSonar
extends java.lang.Object

Sonar wrapper class for launching sonar analysis in a convenient way. This Sonar wrapper is not specific to Java project so can be used for to analyse any kind of project supported by SonarQube.
